text: Petr Skoumal (7 March 1938 - 28 September 2014) was a Czech musician and composer. He was best known for composing for many movies and television shows. He started his career in 1971 and his last credit was in 2013. He worked on animation shorts such as Pat & Mat and Maxipes FÃ­k. Skoumal was born in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He was the son of translator Aloys Skoumal. Skoumal died after a long illness on 28 September 2014 in Prague. He was 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech composers Category:Jazz pianists Category:Musicians from Prague Category:Czech songwriters
title: Petr Skoumal
